chapter_content.title: Word Processing
learning_objectives: Benefits of using a word processing software
Adding clip arts and charts to a document

content.description: Your school principal has informed you that this year's Art Festival is going to be celebrated. The assigned task of your team is preparing necessary documents for the arts festival (Letters, Reports, Invitations, Certificates).
content.challenge: Documents should be well prepared and printed. After drafting, you need to find the best method of document preparation.
bad_solutions: Hand written invitations (Difficult to write in similar size)
Using a typewriter in the library (Cannot add pictures, borders, etc.)
content.solution: Use a computer with Word Processing Software.

content.text: We often use different types of documents in our day-to-day activities and preparing these documents in different styles is called word processing. To avoid the shortcomings of pen/pencil based documents, we use word processing software.

content.name: Microsoft Office Word 2010
content.launch_path: Start -> All Programs -> Microsoft Office -> Microsoft Office Word 2010

interface_components.name: Title Bar
interface_components.description: Shows the name of the document (e.g., Document1). Contains minimize, maximize, close buttons.

interface_components.name: Ribbon
interface_components.description: Special feature containing tabs (File, Home, Insert, etc.). Icons represent functions. Classes: Clipboard, Font, Paragraph, Styles, Editing.

interface_components.name: Quick Access Tool Bar
interface_components.description: Quick commands above/below ribbon (New, Save, Open, Zoom, Undo, Redo).

interface_components.name: Status Bar
interface_components.description: At bottom left. Shows number of pages, words, language, view buttons.

interface_components.name: Scroll Bar
interface_components.description: Used to go up and down.

interface_components.name: Zoom Control
interface_components.description: Adjust size of pictures on screen.

interface_components.name: Title Bar
interface_components.description: Top most bar. Shows name (e.g., Untitled 1).

interface_components.name: Menu Bar
interface_components.description: Below Title Bar. Features: File, Edit, View, Insert, Format, Tables, Tools, Window, Help.

interface_components.name: Standard Tool Bar
interface_components.description: Icons for New, Save, Open, Copy, Cut, Paste, Print, etc.

interface_components.name: Formatting Tool Bar
interface_components.description: Formatting methods (Bold, Italic, Alignment, Bullets, Indentation).

sections.title: Let us discuss some important things in preparing a new document

items.title: Saving the Document
items.description: File -> Save (Ctrl+S). Provide proper name and location.

items.title: Saving the file by another name
items.description: File -> Save As. Select new location and name.

items.title: Opening a document
items.description: File -> Open (Ctrl+O). Select file from 'Look in' location.

items.title: Saving a document using a password
items.description: File -> Save (or Save As) -> Tools -> General Options -> Type password.

content.word: Page Layout -> Page Setup (Word) or Format -> Page (Writer)

content.title: Methods of Selection
items: Few words: Drag from first to last.
Sentence: Click first word, drag to last.
Row: Drag to white right arrow.
Paragraph: Click twice or click first word and drag to last.

content.name: Shapes and Images
actions: Format Shape/Image (Size, Color, Border, Position, Rotation)

content.name: Symbols
content.description: Adding special symbols not on keyboard.

content.name: Correcting Spelling and Grammar
content.details: Errors underlined in red (spelling) and green (grammar). Click Change to correct, Ignore for names.

content.name: Find and Replace
content.details: Find a word and replace it with another word easily.

content.name: Print Preview
content.description: Check document before printing to ensure formatting, indentation, etc. are correct.

content.name: Print
options: Select Page Range (Current page, Selection, All)
Select PDF format for easy distribution

content.description: Used to send invitations, letters or print certificates to several people using a data source (Address List).

content.name: For Microsoft Word
steps: 1. Select 'Mailing' Tab -> Start Mail Merge -> Letters.
2. Select 'Select Recipients' -> Type New List (or Use Existing List).
4. Type data (New Entry, Delete Entry, Find). Click Ok.
5. Write letter and insert fields (Insert Merge Field) or use Greeting Line.

content.name: For LibreOffice Writer
steps: 4. Select 'Insert Address Block' -> Create Address List (or Add).
7. Continue to create Salutation and Address Block.
9. Save, Print, or Send as E-mail.

sections.title: Summary
points: Word processing software allows creating, editing, and formatting documents.
Benefits include spell check, thesaurus, images, mail merge, etc.
Steps to prepare a document: Open, Save, Format (Page Setup, Text, Paragraph), Insert Objects, Proofread, Print.
Formatting options include changing font, alignment, borders, tables, and columns.
Mail merge helps send personalized letters to many people using a data source.
